video_title: Startup ideas and frameworks to make you wealthy.

content_profile.title: Startup ideas and frameworks to make you wealthy.

key_takeaways: Solution: Create comprehensive health service with single point of contact (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Direct outreach with personalized loom videos (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Concurrent audience building for market understanding (Channel: community)
Strategy: Direct outreach with detailed loom videos to dream customers
Strategy: High-ticket niche services with comprehensive packages

startup_ideas.title: Social media insurance company
startup_ideas.target_market: content creators and businesses with large social media followings
startup_ideas.problem_solved: protection against loss of social media accounts and digital assets
startup_ideas.business_model: insurance premiums for peace of mind coverage
startup_ideas.validation: assess value of existing social media assets

startup_ideas.title: Comprehensive postpartum health service
startup_ideas.problem_solved: fragmented healthcare and information overload during critical health period
startup_ideas.validation: direct outreach to target customers with detailed service offerings

startup_ideas.title: Weekly text/email service for pregnant women
startup_ideas.problem_solved: information overload and uncertainty about weekly health needs
startup_ideas.validation: test with small group of pregnant women

market_gaps.title: Postpartum women overwhelmed by fragmented health information and providers
market_gaps.solution_approach: Create comprehensive health service with single point of contact

trend_opportunities.title: Increasing value and vulnerability of digital assets
trend_opportunities.opportunity: insurance products for digital creators and online businesses

trend_opportunities.title: Demand for personalized, comprehensive health services for women
trend_opportunities.opportunity: niche health services targeting specific life stages

supporting_comments: not sure how you're constantly full of ideas!
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Opportunity for tools/services that help entrepreneurs focus and prioritize ideas rather than generate more

practical_next_steps: Validate one of the startup ideas with target market interviews
Review mistakes to avoid and create prevention checklist
